I have loaded an intensity sample I was working with Mikhail on before he left. I was able to get the x & y axis to reflect real data (rather than the data point number), as well as getting a few other things working with the help of Mikhail. However, now that he has left I have three open issues. Anyone with good knowledge of D3 should be able to help as the sample is fairly small and concise. I am having trouble binding to Viewport2D.ContentBounds, ViewportPanel.ViewportBounds, and cannot get the proper z value for my x,y position in a tooltip.

Please have a look at the sample, my comments are in the areas that need work and are prefaced by "QUESTION >>"

http://cid-be559ac3cb2dc573.office.live.com/self.aspx/.Public/Intensity%5E_Sample.rar

 

Thanks to anyone who can resolve this and thanks to Mikhail for all of his help thus far.

Thanks grantz, setting the DataContext of the container resolved both of my binding issues (the ContentBounds and ViewportBounds).

I was also able to get the z value working as a tooltip to the draggable point. I used the weighted nearest neighbor interpolation approach and it worked very well. If anyone is interested in that info, let me know.
